subject: Springs
description_text: Hello I’m interested in a pedal set but have a question. You have springs for sale are those for elastomer replacement or some other usage? As it doesn’t say in description. Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi Simonas Ozekauskas,    Yes, these four short springs—red, yellow, blue, and green—are used to replace the elastomer for adjusting the more pedal feel.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/sprung
